pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Pumpkin, 1 Clover, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 50 Sun value.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Flying. Illuminating. Stuns medium or smaller Zombies every 1s. Instant-kills non-covered small Zombies and non-covered medium height zombies without headgear.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Everyone thinks Saucer is alien, but they are just really shy, that's why they don't blend in.

pages.title: Stallers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Saucers emit light to stun and capture Zombies below them.
